title: RP rune pages refund??
body:
I bought 7 additional rune pages with RP.
I was wondering are they still useful?, or do I get compensated?

replies.body: They are compensated by epic mystery skins after completing a mission!  You can check your purchase history after completing a game to see which ones you received.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yUKyBNw2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T23:40:31.008+0000)
>
> They are compensated by epic mystery skins after completing a mission!  You can check your purchase history after completing a game to see which ones you received.  :D

Do you get the same reward for purchasing a 7 page bundle as you would for buying one page? I only received 4 skins despite purchasing 13+ RP pages.
I had 20 rune pages cut back to 9 uninstalled never to play again
